AD_LaezelBetrayed.synopsis: The player just assimilated Orpheus using the Brain Extract spell. If Lae'zel is on the Orpheus Path she becomes filled with rage.

AD_LaezelBetrayedDeath.synopsis: When Orpheus Path Lae'zel dies after the player assimilated Orpheus.

TadpoleOrNetherstoneAbsent.synopsis: If the player attempts to proceed past key points without the supreme tadpole or combined Netherstones, they will be warned that doing so will just lead to a game over. Repeated attempts will trigger a Thrall of the Absolute ending.
TadpoleOrNetherstoneAbsent.how_to_trigger: load END_Mainoe end_startillithidoptionsDrop the combine stones item/give stones to Emperor then drop tadpole he gives youattempt to leave the astral prism

PAD_DroppedCrownController.synopsis: The player just dropped the complete crown controller, the item needed tocast Karsus' Compulsion and defeat the Netherbrain! Pretty important stuff. The player will make a comment and a marker will appear on the map.
PAD_DroppedCrownController.how_to_trigger: get the complete crown controllerdrop it

AD_OrpheusTadpoleReact.synopsis: The player just transformed into a mind flayer using the supreme tadpole. Orpheus reacts with respect to the player for making such a grand sacrifice.
AD_OrpheusTadpoleReact.how_to_trigger: Load END_MainUse debug book to add Orpheus as a follow and the player receiving the supreme tadpoleuse the tadpoletransformwait for reaction

AD_LaezelBetrayed_0.speaker: Lae'zel
AD_LaezelBetrayed_0.text: Tsk'va. How dare you turn against me?!

TadpoleOrNetherstoneAbsent_0.speaker: Narrator
TadpoleOrNetherstoneAbsent_0.text: *The temptation to push on is strong, but without the Emperor's gift - the parasite - you will have no means to evolve.*

TadpoleOrNetherstoneAbsent_2.speaker: Narrator
TadpoleOrNetherstoneAbsent_2.text: *You may believe you have all you need within yourself to defeat the Netherbrain, but you are mistaken. Something is missing.*

TadpoleOrNetherstoneAbsent_1.speaker: Narrator
TadpoleOrNetherstoneAbsent_1.text: *You push on, knowing full well how it will end, how it will all end - with you. And your folly.*

TadpoleOrNetherstoneAbsent_3.speaker: Narrator
TadpoleOrNetherstoneAbsent_3.text: *You yearn for the final confrontation. But to face the Netherbrain without the stones would lead to only one outcome - your doom.*

TadpoleOrNetherstoneAbsent_5.speaker: Narrator
TadpoleOrNetherstoneAbsent_5.text: *As bold as you may feel, with neither stones nor parasite you have no means to control or dominate the Netherbrain. You will die.*

PAD_DroppedCrownController_0.speaker: Player
PAD_DroppedCrownController_0.text: We challenged the gods to get those Netherstones. Hold onto them tight.

PAD_DroppedCrownController_1.speaker: Player
PAD_DroppedCrownController_1.text: Careful. If we lose the Netherstones, we lose everything.

AD_OrpheusTadpoleReact_0.speaker: Orpheus
AD_OrpheusTadpoleReact_0.text: A most noble sacrifice, tiefling. Gith's blessings upon you.

AD_OrpheusTadpoleReact_1.speaker: Orpheus
AD_OrpheusTadpoleReact_1.text: A most noble sacrifice. Gith's blessings upon you, ra'stil.
